const bountiesAfterCreation = await bonusEscrow.getAllBounties();
console.log("Bounty created via console. Transaction hash:", tx.hash);
await tx.wait();
const tx = await bonusEscrow.connect(signer).createBounty("Test Bounty Title", "Test Bounty Description", { value: rewardAmount });
const rewardAmount = ethers.parseEther("0.01");

const BonusEscrow = await ethers.getContractFactory("BonusEscrow");
